duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain and ensure the health, availability, and security of production and Test database environments.
Implement technologies to improve scalability and reliability of databases and infrastructure.
Provide database solutions for complex business issues including data processing, loading, performance improvements, and replication.
Diagnose, troubleshoot, and resolve database related issues including storage, performance, availability, and security.
Automate database management, maintenance, and data processing activities.
Develop, modify, and maintain database objects, and work as part of a project team to coordinate database development.
Evaluate and deploy database tools, and collaborate with technical/non-technical resources for project work and troubleshooting exercises.
Analyze Operating System statistics, troubleshoot performance-related problems, and adapt new automation technologies.
Participate in 24/7 on-call rotation and escalate issues as needed.
Create and maintain documentation related to database design, configuration, standards, and performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or other technical discipline (Technical Certifications are a plus)
